title: Applications invited to change schools
content: STUDENTS wishing to switch schools have been urged to visit the Education Ministry’s customer services building in Isa Town tomorrow. They should carry relevant documents, and applications will be accepted until Thursday, from 9am to 1pm .  You Might Like
